channel.title: Booting on Jincheng Li
channel.description: Recent content in Booting on Jincheng Li

item.title: What Happens When You Press the Power Button on Your Linux Computer (Unfinished)
item.description: I wanted to start a series of posts on how the Linux operating system works, inspired by linux-insides, but instead of covering the entire operating system which is way too much work for my lazy ass, I’ll focus on several aspects of the OS and try to do a good job explaining them – I’m hoping to make this comprehensible for someone who’s seen some assembly and C, but isn’t necessarily familiar with the internals of an OS.
